Perform a power action on a machine using one of the power types.

Parameters.Name: node_id
Parameters.Description: Node ID - Must adhere to cXnY format (X=cartridge number, Y=node number

Parameters.Name: power_pass
Parameters.Description: Proxmox password, required if a token name and secret aren't given

Parameters.Name: power_verify_ssl
Parameters.Description: Verify SSL connections with system CA certificates

Parameters.Name: power_on_uri
Parameters.Description: URI to power on the node

Parameters.Name: power_off_uri
Parameters.Description: URI to power off the node

Parameters.Name: power_query_uri
Parameters.Description: URI to query the nodes power status

Parameters.Name: power_on_regex
Parameters.Description: Regex to confirm the node is on

Parameters.Name: power_off_regex
Parameters.Description: Regex to confirm the node is off

Parameters.Name: power_token
Parameters.Description: Power token, will be used in place of power_user and power_pass

Parameters.Name: power_verify_ssl
Parameters.Description: Verify SSL connections with system CA certificates

Description: Perform an action on a pod using one of the pod types.
